QuestData.Title: Crystal Fury
QuestData.Description:
A drogbar stonecaster known as Gelmogg entered our sacred water caverns and aims to draw its power into himself.
We must destroy him before he gets too powerful.
He is in the upper caverns.
QuestData.CompletionText: The drogbar used to control only earthen magic, but it seems they've found a way to draw power from other sources.
QuestData.RewardText: I have never seen a drogbar transform like that. The Hammer of Khaz'goroth is indeed powerful.
